title: $ S^ 3$: Synonymous Semantic Space for Improving Zero-Shot Generalization of Vision-Language Models
details: X Yin, Q Wang, B Cao, Q Hu - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.04925, 2024
abstract: Recently, many studies have been conducted to enhance the zero-shot generalization ability of vision-language models (eg, CLIP) by addressing the semantic misalignment between image and text embeddings in downstream tasks …
